"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This classic rock anthem would be the perfect opening track for a motivational and uplifting soundtrack to your life. It's all about perseverance and pushing through challenges, which is exactly what you're doing by pursuing your goals and dreams.

"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - This timeless hit is all about holding on to hope and belief in yourself, even when things get tough. It's a great song to play when you're feeling discouraged or uncertain, as it reminds you that you have the power to keep going and achieve your goals.

"Roar" by Katy Perry - This empowering anthem is all about finding your inner strength and roaring back to life after facing challenges. It's a great song to play when you're feeling down or frustrated, as it reminds you of your own resilience and determination.

"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - This intense and motivational rap song is perfect for those moments when you need a boost of energy and motivation. It's all about seizing opportunities and making the most of every moment, which is exactly what you're doing by pursuing your goals and dreams.

"Hall of Fame" by The Script - This uplifting and inspiring song is all about achieving greatness and making a lasting impact on the world. It's a great song to play when you're feeling uncertain or unsure of yourself, as it reminds you of your own potential and the possibilities that are within your reach.
